DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the frequency of hypotension between hyperbaric anesthetics and isobaric anesthetics during cesarean section and determine whether continuous infusion of phenylephrine is effective in mothers who received hyperbaric anesthetics.
DOC.brief_title: Hemodynamic Impact of Hyperbaric Versus Isobaric for Spinal Anesthesia During Cesarean Delivery
DOC.criteria: pregnant woman scheduled for elective cesarean delivery under spinal anesthesia patients who refuse involved patients who have preeclampsia patients who have heart disease patients who fetal distress is suspicious
